Hello,

I tried to install Gazebo 7 on trusty and I have the same issue with copy\_file\(\) but called from another file.

``util/libgazebo_util.so.7.15.0: undefined reference to `boost::filesystem::detail::copy_file(boost::filesystem::path const&, boost::filesystem::path const&, boost::filesystem::copy_option, boost::system::error_code*)'``  
`collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status`  
`make[2]: *** [gazebo/gzserver-7.15.0] Error 1`  
`make[1]: *** [gazebo/CMakeFiles/gzserver.dir/all] Error 2`  
`make: *** [all] Error 2`

I don’t know if this issue is related to the same error. I used the branch of gazebo7 as written in the installation file. Should I take another one ? 

For instance this one gazebo7-fix-boost-compile-error ? Update: I tried this one and I got this error:

``libgazebo_common.so.7.13.0: undefined reference to `boost::filesystem::detail::copy_file(boost::filesystem::path const&, boost::filesystem::path const&, boost::filesystem::copy_option, boost::system::error_code*)'``  
`collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status`  
`make[2]: *** [gazebo/common/UNIT_Mesh_TEST] Error 1`  
`make[1]: *** [gazebo/common/CMakeFiles/UNIT_Mesh_TEST.dir/all] Error 2`

Best regards,
